name: Continental Explorer: Mondstadt
description: Light up the entire Mondstadt map (excluding the Dragonspine area).

name: Brush of a Thousand Winds
description: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).

name: Let the Wind Lead
description: Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Mondstadt to their maximum level.

name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Mondstadt
description: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in Mondstadt.

name: Guiding Wind
description: Follow %var% Seelie in Mondstadt to their Seelie Courts (excludes the Dragonspine area).

name: Wind-Chasing Treasure Hunter
description: Open %var% chests in Mondstadt (excluding the Dragonspine area).

name: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
description: Complete %var% Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).
